structure.unit: Manufacture And Sale Of Gas And Electricity

law.catch_line: Gas Company To Provide Maintenance And Improvement Of Gate Boxes During Street, Sidewalk Or Road Repair; Application For Assistance
law.text: Whenever the commonwealth or a city or town undertakes the repair of streets, roads or sidewalks the appropriate gas company shall provide for the maintenance and improvements of its gate boxes located in the streets, roads or sidewalks to be repaired, so that the gate boxes are more easily and immediately accessible. A gas company may apply for funds under chapter 90 to assist in paying the costs of the maintenance and improvement.
